title: Conan the Barbarian (1982)
summary: A village is attacked by the evil ruler of the Snake Cult, Thulsa Doom and his evil warriors, when Thulsa Doom and his warriors kills his parents, a young boy named Conan is enslaved. Years later, Conan grows up and becomes a mighty warrior and is trained as a fighter. After years as a slave and as a gladiator, Conan is set free. Conan sets out on a quest as he vows to avenge his parents and solve the riddle of steel. Joined by a archer named Subotai , a beautiful thief who falls in love with Conan, Valeria (sandahl Bergman') and a Chinese wizard , Conan and his companions sets out to rescue Princess Yasmina , daughter of King Osric , from the Snake Cult, and get his revenge on Thulsa Doom and avenge his parents.
